Reviews.Title: for the price a good laptop
Reviews.Author: bilbo
Reviews.Content: overall a good laptop, light and portable. comes with Win7 along with a copy of Win7. I would definately but another if i needed it. I am thinking about replacing the HDD though, since it is really small at only 80gb

ProductInfo.Features:
Processor - INTEL Core 2 Duo 2000 MHz || Memory Installed - 4096mb DDR2 > Upgradeable to 4096MB
Hard Drive - 80Gig Serial ATA || Optical Drive - DVD/CDRW || Screen Size - 14.0" WideScreen LCD
Internet Connection(s) - The installed 802 11 ABG WI-FI card will allow you to connect to any available wireless network, and the internal Ethernet port will allow a high speed wired connection
Software Installed - NEW Windows 7 Professional 32 Bit, word document & spreadsheet applications, shortcut to Microsofts free virus protection along with a restore partition on the hard drive for easy reinstallation. All software is Genuine!!
What's in the Box? - HP 6910p with NEW pre-installed software, power cord, software registration instructions and a 60 day Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: HP 6910p INTEL Core 2 Duo 2000 MHz 80Gig Serial ATA HDD 4096mb DDR2 DVD/CDRW Wireless WI-FI 14.0" WideScreen LCD Genuine Windows 7 Professional 32 Bit Laptop Notebook Computer
